function.name: GetEntity
function.desc: Returns the Entity associated with this memory fragment.

function.name: IsInView
function.desc: Returns ''true'' if the target is visible to the NPC this memory fragment belongs to.

function.name: GetLastKnownPosition
function.desc: Returns the last known position of the target.

function.name: GetLastKnownVelocity
function.desc: Returns the last known velocity of the target.

function.name: GetLastCheckTime
function.desc: Returns the last time the NPC checked the target.

function.name: GetLastTimeSeen
function.desc: Returns the last time the target was visible to the NPC.

function.name: GetLastTimeHeared
function.desc: Returns the last time the target was audible to the NPC.

function.name: GetLastTimeSensed
function.desc: Returns the last time the NPC has seen or heared the target.
